description: Certificate of Lawfulness for a loft conversion with two side dormers, conversion of gable end window to Juliette balcony, proposed roof lights and solar panels and new roof covering over existing garage
decision_conditions: The operations do not fall within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015, as amended. Specifically;

1. The cubic content of the resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than 50 cubic metres and therefore the proposed roof alterations would not comply with part B.1 (d) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the General Permitted Development Order (2015).

2. One of the proposed side dormers would extend beyond the outside face of the external wall of the original dwellinghouse and therefore the proposed roof alterations would not comply with part B.2 (b) (ii) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the General Permitted Development Order (2015).

3. The windows of the proposed side dormers would not be obscure-glazed and unclear whether the parts of the window which can be opened would be more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is in
The proposed roof plan submitted as part of the application does not accurately depict the roof form of the subject dwellinghouse.
